duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the construction of Healthcare facilities and ensure projects are competitively bid and meet the needs of the client.
Setup project to include budget, contracts, insurance, risk analysis, review of documents, develop project schedule, estimate, plan for resources, and obtain necessary permits and licenses.
Plan labor, quality control inspections, and employee safety meetings.
Buyout of purchase orders and subcontracts, material takeoffs and budget vs. actual cost analysis, and generating field PO plan.
Manage project closeout including punchlist management, contract and subcontract lien releases, quality control meetings, and customer walkthrough and handover.
Staff Support in the pursuit, design, pre-construction, and construction management of projects.
Travel up to 25% with the possibility of extended travel.

education_certification.credential: BS Degree in relevant discipline; Building Construction preferred
Experience working in AHCA environments on active health care facilities required
